comments: She say\'s she wants to have a discussion, but it\'s always a lecture from her. I learned to just sit there, listen to her left wing view\'s & was glad when the semester was over!!!

Excellent instructor. She is helpful and encourages students to look beyond the immediate answers. If you\'re lazy or can\'t take the occasional criticism, don\'t bother taking her. If you\'re mature and can partake in intelligent discussion, she\'s your woman!

I found through many endeavors and characteristic thorouhness,touche\' to Shakespeer, while further pontification is unjustified, unnessary through this one\'s review but alas has presented itself anyway Ms. Young is a caring, thoughtful teacher who exudes a true love of the English Language and of her students
